bt.protocol

Class Protocols

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.protocol.Protocols

  • public class Protocols
extends Object
    Provides utility functions for binary protocol implementations.
    Since:
    1.0

      • readLong

        public static long readLong(byte[] bytes,
                            int offset)
        Decode the binary representation of a Long from a byte array.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Arbitrary byte array. It's length must be at least offset + 8.
        offset - Offset in byte array to start decoding from (inclusive, 0-based)
        Since:
        1.0

      • readLong

        public static Long readLong(ByteBuffer buffer)
        Decode the binary representation of a Long from a buffer.
        Parameters:
        buffer - Buffer to read from. Decoding will be done starting with the index denoted by Buffer.position()
        Returns:
        Decoded value, or null if there are insufficient bytes in buffer (i.e. buffer.remaining() < 8)
        Since:
        1.0

      • readInt

        public static int readInt(byte[] bytes,
                          int offset)
        Decode the binary representation of an Integer from a byte array.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Arbitrary byte array. It's length must be at least offset + 4.
        offset - Offset in byte array to start decoding from (inclusive, 0-based)
        Since:
        1.0

      • readInt

        public static Integer readInt(ByteBuffer buffer)
        Decode the binary representation of an Integer from a buffer.
        Parameters:
        buffer - Buffer to read from. Decoding will be done starting with the index denoted by Buffer.position()
        Returns:
        Decoded value, or null if there are insufficient bytes in buffer (i.e. buffer.remaining() < 4)
        Since:
        1.0

      • readShort

        public static short readShort(byte[] bytes,
                              int offset)
        Decode the binary representation of a Short from a byte array.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Arbitrary byte array. It's length must be at least offset + 2.
        offset - Offset in byte array to start decoding from (inclusive, 0-based)
        Since:
        1.0

      • readShort

        public static Short readShort(ByteBuffer buffer)
        Decode the binary representation of a Short from a buffer.
        Parameters:
        buffer - Buffer to read from. Decoding will be done starting with the index denoted by Buffer.position()
        Returns:
        Decoded value, or null if there are insufficient bytes in buffer (i.e. buffer.remaining() < 2)
        Since:
        1.0

      • verifyPayloadHasLength

        public static void verifyPayloadHasLength(Class<? extends Message> type,
                                          int expectedLength,
                                          int actualLength)
        Convenience method to check if actual message length is the same as expected length.
        Throws:
        InvalidMessageException - if expectedLength != actualLength
        Since:
        1.0

        public static void setBit(byte[] bytes,
                          int i)
        Sets i-th bit in a bitmask.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Bitmask.
        i - Bit index (0-based)
        Since:
        1.0

      • getBit

        public static int getBit(byte[] bytes,
                         int i)
        Gets i-th bit in a bitmask.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Bitmask.
        i - Bit index (0-based)
        Returns:
        1 if bit is set, 0 otherwise
        Since:
        1.0

      • toHex

        public static String toHex(byte[] bytes)
        Get hex-encoded representation of a binary array.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Binary data
        Returns:
        String containing hex-encoded representation (lower case)
        Since:
        1.3

        public static byte[] fromHex(String s)
